dmca.title: Blog subject complains of copied photograph
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

This is to bring your attention to a violation of our DMCA rights. The allegedly infringing material is located on a server under your care, custody, and/or control. The specific URL is: 

http://michaelcrook.blogspot.com 

In addition to slanderous statements (my legal name is in fact Michael Crook) this website contains a copyrighted photograph, which is on your servers as: 

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5209/990/320/85392919_7228b8fb0c_m.jpg 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

I may be contacted at the above address, and may be reached via e-mail at 
[private]@mcipdns.com in regards to this matter. 

Sincerely, 
Michael Crook 
Michael Crook Internet Properties
